import React,{ useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { CHeader, CToggler, CHeaderBrand, CHeaderNav, CHeaderNavItem, CHeaderNavLink, CSubheader, CBreadcrumbRouter, CLink, CModal, CModalHeader, CModalTitle, CModalBody, CModalFooter, CButton, CCardBody, CRow, CCol, CFormGroup, CLabel, CSelect, CInput } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' // routes config import routes from '../routes' import { TheHeaderDropdown, TheHeaderDropdownMssg, TheHeaderDropdownNotif, TheHeaderDropdownTasks } from './index' const TheHeader = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const sidebarShow = useSelector(state => state.sidebarShow) const toggleSidebar = () => { const val = [true, 'responsive'].includes(sidebarShow) ? false : 'responsive' dispatch({type: 'set', sidebarShow: val}) } const toggleSidebarMobile = () => { const val = [false, 'responsive'].includes(sidebarShow) ? true : 'responsive' dispatch({type: 'set', sidebarShow: val}) } const [large, setLarge] = useState(false) function showLogoutModal(){ alert("logouit") setLarge(!large) } return ( setLarge(!large)} size="lg" > Sale Everything... Are you sure want ot logout...? setLarge(!large)}>No setLarge(!large)}>Yes{' '}
 Dashboard  Settings
) } export default TheHeader
